overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a strong social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, engaging with a total of 3580 followers. His posts cover academic themes and research advancements, generating varied engagement levels across platforms with LinkedIn showing the highest engagement.

contentThemes.description: Posts about new research papers, awards, and grants.
Posts advertising open positions in research and academia.
Announcements and discussions about upcoming academic conferences and presentations.

recommendations: Increase interaction on Bluesky by posting more frequently and engaging with followers.
Leverage LinkedIn's high engagement by sharing more in-depth insights and professional content.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon shows moderate engagement; focus on increasing follower interaction through discussions and Q&A posts.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn demonstrates the highest engagement, especially with professional announcements, indicating a strong professional network presence.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
